feed.title: TRAIL
feed.subtitle: An engaging 1-3 sentence description of your lab.

entry.title: Congratulations to James üéâ
entry.content: I am happy to share that James Brodovsky is now officially a PhD candidate!
entry.summary: I am happy to share that James Brodovsky is now officially a PhD candidate!

entry.title: Guest Lecture at Northwestern University
entry.content: I recently gave a talk at Northwestern University Center for Robotics and Biosystems. It summarizes a lot of the recent work we have done in TRAIL. Check it out
entry.summary: I recently gave a talk at Northwestern University Center for Robotics and Biosystems. It summarizes a lot of the recent work we have done in TRAIL. Check it out

entry.title: New Publication
entry.content: Jun‚Äôs paper, ‚ÄúThe Convex Uncertain Voronoi Diagram for Safe Multi-Robot Multi-Target Tracking Under Localization Uncertainty,‚Äù was just published in the Journal of Intelligent and Robotic Systems. Check it out here

entry.title: CORL 2023
entry.content: Congratulations, Zhanteng, on having your paper ‚ÄúStochastic Occupancy Grid Map Prediction in Dynamic Scenes‚Äù accepted to CoRL 2023. Check out the paper on arXiv and the code on GitHub.
entry.summary: Congratulations, Zhanteng, on having your paper ‚ÄúStochastic Occupancy Grid Map Prediction in Dynamic Scenes‚Äù accepted to CoRL 2023. Check out the paper on arXiv and the code on GitHub.

entry.title: Promotion to Associate Professor
entry.content: As of July 1, I am officially an Associate Professor of Mechanical Engineering with tenure.
entry.summary: As of July 1, I am officially an Associate Professor of Mechanical Engineering with tenure.

entry.title: Congratulations Zhanteng
entry.content: Zhanteng was just officially elevated to PhD candidacy.
entry.summary: Zhanteng was just officially elevated to PhD candidacy.

entry.title: IEEE T-RO
entry.content:
Congratulations, Zhanteng, for having a paper accepted for publication in the IEEE Transactions on Robotics.

Zhanteng Xie and Philip Dames. ‚ÄúDRL-VO: Learning to Navigate Through Crowded Dynamic Scenes Using Velocity Obstacles.‚Äù IEEE Transactions on Robotics (T-RO).
entry.summary: Congratulations, Zhanteng, for having a paper accepted for publication in the IEEE Transactions on Robotics.

entry.title: New Research Award
entry.content: TRAIL received a new award from NSF to research Visual Tactile Neural Fields for Active Digital Twin Generation. This is a three-year collaboration with Kostas Daniilidis from the University of Pennsylvania and Monroe Kennedy III from Stanford University.
entry.summary: TRAIL received a new award from NSF to research Visual Tactile Neural Fields for Active Digital Twin Generation. This is a three-year collaboration with Kostas Daniilidis from the University of Pennsylvania and Monroe Kennedy III from Stanford University.

entry.title: DARS 2022
entry.content:
Congratulations, Pujie and Jun, for having three papers accepted to DARS 2022 between the two of you!

  1. Pujie Xin and Philip Dames. ‚ÄúComparing Stochastic Optimization Methods for Multi-Robot, Multi-Target Tracking.‚Äù
  2. Pujie Xin and Philip Dames. ‚ÄúDistributed Multiple Hypothesis Tracker for Mobile Sensor Networks.‚Äù
  3. Jun Chen, Philip Dames, and Shinkyu Park. ‚ÄúDistributed Multi-robot Tracking of Unknown Clustered Targets with Noisy Measurements.‚Äù
entry.summary: Congratulations, Pujie and Jun, for having three papers accepted to DARS 2022 between the two of you!

entry.title: NSF Career Award
entry.content: I received an NSF CAREER Award in June 2022 for my project ‚ÄúFormalizing the Concept of Teamwork in Heterogeneous Multi-Robot Systems.‚Äù See also a Temple news article about the project and the official NSF page.
entry.summary: I received an NSF CAREER Award in June 2022 for my project ‚ÄúFormalizing the Concept of Teamwork in Heterogeneous Multi-Robot Systems.‚Äù See also a Temple news article about the project and the official NSF page.
